title: Input Handling Integration and Testing
description: Verify and test keyboard input forwarding from client to server PTY. Input handling code already exists (FEAT-010), including keyboard parsing in input/keys.rs and byte conversion in input_handler.rs. The main gap is integration testing to ensure end-to-end input flow works correctly.
user_impact: Ensures users can type in terminal panes and use all keyboard shortcuts reliably, which is fundamental to terminal multiplexer usability
